ComicInfo.Summary: Sploorch (or The Beginning of the End...): Deadpool takes the injured Monty to Landau, Luckman and Lake to get a little healing. Zoe is less than pleased to see him and arrests the merc with a mouth. Finding that Monty loves her, however, Zoe has a change of heart and quits the firm as she frees Deadpool and teleports away with her new flame. Deadpool and Mercedes take the same teleporter which lands them right in the arms of T-Ray.
ComicInfo.Title: Sploorch (or The Beginning of the End...)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
